body:
I've been trying to join minecraft recently with the new launcher and whenever i try joining on it it just says preparing

http://imgur.com/Pjjqk7J

any ideas how to fix it?
body_tagged:

title: Help minecraft no work

replies.body:
Heres some ideas
-email mojang
-try a different version of minecraft
-restart wifi
-throw monitor out of window(recommended)
replies.body_tagged:
Heres some ideas
-email mojang
-try a different version of minecraft
-restart wifi
-throw monitor out of window(recommended)

replies.body:
nah its fine now its works 


requesting lock
